# Testing Documentation Navigation

> A comprehensive guide to modern Svelte testing with vitest-browser-svelte, focused on real browser testing and the Client-Server Alignment Strategy.

## Core Documentation
- [Getting Started](./getting-started.md) - Essential setup and foundational patterns for testing Svelte 5 applications
- [Testing Patterns](./testing-patterns.md) - Common testing patterns and best practices for components
- [Best Practices](./best-practices.md) - Strategic approaches and proven patterns for reliable tests
- [API Reference](./api-reference.md) - Complete reference for all testing utilities and assertions
- [Troubleshooting](./troubleshooting.md) - Solutions for common issues and debugging strategies

## Additional Resources
- [Migration Guide](./migration-guide.md) - Step-by-step guide for migrating from @testing-library/svelte
- [CI/CD](./ci-cd.md) - Production-ready testing pipeline configuration
- [E2E Testing](./e2e-testing.md) - End-to-end testing patterns with Playwright
- [About](./about.md) - Project background and philosophy

## Available LLM Documentation Formats
- Markdown - Human-readable format for direct consumption
- Plain Text - Simple format for legacy systems
- JSON - Structured format for programmatic use
- HTML - Web-ready format for online viewing

The documentation follows the Client-Server Alignment Strategy to ensure reliable full-stack testing through all stages of development.
